entry.title: Hello world
entry.content: Here’s my new website built in Python with Sphinx, ablog, and MyST using the pydata-sphinx-theme. It’s based on Chris Holdgraf’s website: https://predictablynoisy.com/. The old one was built using the Python static site generator Nikola.
entry.summary: Here’s my new website built in Python with Sphinx, ablog, and MyST using the pydata-sphinx-theme. It’s based on Chris Holdgraf’s website: https://predictablynoisy.com/. The old one was built using the Python static site generator Nikola.
